/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A few people can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day. Cars are parked along the side of the road, indicating a busy day in the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the details of the scene.
